**This is the field to report bugs with the L5 creative coding library itself. To report a bug on the L5lua.org website or its documentation, visit the [L5-website](https://github.com/L5lua/L5-website) repo issues.**

**Describe the bug**
A clear and concise description of what the bug is.

**To Reproduce**
Steps to reproduce the behavior. It is usually best to include a [minimal code example](https://stackoverflow.com/help/minimal-reproducible-example):


**Expected behavior**
A clear and concise description of what you expected to happen.

**Screenshots**
If applicable, add screenshots to help explain your problem.

**Platform:**
 - OS: [e.g. macOS 14.2.1, Windows 11, Ubuntu 22.04]
 - L5 Version: [e.g. 0.1.3] (check top of L5.lua file)

**Additional context**
Add any other context about the problem here.
